HSK 2: 累

Freq: 9347

鸓〔～鼠〕小飞鼠，形似鼯鼠，前后肢之间有宽大多毛的膜，尾长，能在大树间滑翔，常在夜间活动。
The small flying squirrel , which resembles a flying squirrel , has a wide, hairy membrane between the fore and aft limbs, and has a long tail, which can glide among large trees and is often active at night.

鸓字的基本解释

鸓
lěi
〔鸓鼠〕小飞鼠，形似鼯鼠，前后肢之间有宽大多毛的膜，尾长，能在大树间滑翔，常在夜间活动。

鸓字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lěi］
［《廣韻》力軌切，上旨，來。］
［《廣韻》力追切，平脂，來。］
(1)即鸓鼠。
(2)传说中的异鸟。

鸓字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鸓； 康熙笔画：26； 页码：页1504第12
【唐韻】力軌切【集韻】魯水切，?音壘。【說文】鸓，鼠形，飛走且乳之鳥也。一名鸓鼠，一名飛生，一名鼯䑕。【陶弘景曰】飛䑕狀如蝙蝠，大如鴟鵝，毛紫色，暗夜行。【李時珍曰】此物肉翅連尾，飛不能上，易至礧墜，故謂之鸓。又【山海經】翠山，其鳥多鸓，其狀如鵲，赤黑而兩首四足，可以禦火。【司馬相如·上林賦】蜼蠼飛鸓。【註】飛鸓䑕首，以其髥飛。又【廣韻】力追切【集韻】倫追切，?音㶟。【廣雅】??，飛鸓也。又【集韻】盧回切，音雷。義同。

暂无。

flying squirrel
Basic explanation of words
flying squirrel
lěi
〔鸓鼠〕The flying squirrel is shaped like a flying squirrel. It has a broad, hairy membrane between its fore and aft limbs. It has a long tail and can glide between large trees. It is often active at night.
flying squirrel

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鸓; Kangxi Strokes: 26; Page Number: Page 1504 No. 12
[Tang Yun] force track cut [Ji Yun] Lu water cut, sound barrier. 【Said the text】Earth, mouse-shaped, flying away and sucking birds. One squirrel, one flying, and one flying bird. [Tao Hongjing said] The flying pi is like a bat, as big as a geese, with purple fur, and walking in the dark. [Li Shizhen said] This thing has meaty wings and tails, so it can't fly up, and it's easy to fall down, so it's called a 鸓. Also [Shanhaijing] Cuishan, its birds are many thrushes, its shape is like a magpie, red and black, with two four-legged heads, which can protect against fire. 【Sima Xiangru·Shanglin Fu】The flying dragonfly. 【Note】Flying head, with its 髥fly. And [Guang Yun] strives to chase [Ji Yun] Lun chases,? Yin 㶟. [Guang Ya]??, Fei Yan also. [Jiyun] Lu Huiqi, Yinlei. The same meaning.
